column1: Master of Science in Strategy, Enterprise & Innovation
column5: This programme has been designed to produce a rounded business graduate who will be able to undertake a variety of roles in an organisation, and, who will possess the transversal skills and understanding of business that is required in challenging times.The programme will support learners to develop advanced core competencies and skills in strategy and business innovation and develop into professional practitioners by bridging business theory and professional practice.Location: ATU DonegalCareer PathwaysThe main employers are:
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
